subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: With a court ruling pending and negotiations at a standstill, America’s Cup organizers announced that the next edition, scheduled for 2009 in Valencia, Spain, would be postponed.
snippet: With a court ruling pending and negotiations at a standstill, America’s Cup organizers announced that the next edition, scheduled for 2009 in Valencia, Spain, would be postponed.
